description: This small Hertfordshire village is located near Ware and Much Hadham in the East Hertfordshire district of the county. This short walk takes you around the village and along the River Ash which flows just north of the settlement. It uses part of the Hertfordshire Way long distance footpath. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Widford. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
